ComicInfo.Summary: Volume 2Streets Run Red, Part 1: After shooting a Darkness-created bullet into the brain of Dominic “The Quiet Don” Alberto and putting him in a coma, Dominic comes out of his coma after his son, Junior, has him taken off life-support.
